channel.title: RscRewind - F2p Pk server
channel.description:
Online now.. 99 Max stats with good rates. We aim to bring back the fun of Rsc pking with a few added extras. So if you miss being able to have a good old pk war at the castle, then this is the Server for you! 24/7 uptime with staff who actually care about their server.
Dedicated Admin, with intent to adhere to suggestions made by the community to make this server a more pleasurable experience.
We are still adding updates both ingame and to our site, but we welcome you to come and join us. Just download the client and login to play. www.rscrewind.com
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2uotc39.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/flwlyp.jpg[/img]

I just saw 2 videos of him hacking very rich people at RSCEmulation. By SQL md5 decrypting at google from his own database host,… Well on another further invastigation, this is not the person who deserve a advertising topic nor being a user on MoparScape.[/quote]You saw videos but didn’t post them? [/quote]

item.title: RscRewind - F2p Pk server
item.dc:creator: @Nucleon Nucleon
item.description:
@Nucleon wrote:

I was the one with the D2H and while Heated may stand correct about Tobbo paying off members to develop the server he fails to admit why he played the server in the first place, and the reason is that it’s really fun. Tobbo didn’t pay me for a website, I told him it was free. In addition to you posting these silly dupes, I’ve went along and fixed them and when Tobbo is done celebrating his birthday they will be added.

If anyone is curious as to why this kid ‘Heated’ is being a drama queen, it’s because he attacked an AFK Admin and he died and lost his stuff, while I and others rushed to loot his pathetic body. Anyways.

Join RscRewind!

Read full topic

item.title: RscRewind - F2p Pk server
item.dc:creator: @Tobbo88 Tobbo88
item.description:
@Tobbo88 wrote:

He came on my server spamming exploits to everyone… yet im the one not being nice? lol and he got his friend to attempt to ddos the server.

then he comes on here and posts that.

all because he died in the wild on a pk server.

Read full topic

item.title: RscRewind - F2p Pk server
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Tobbo88, post:10, topic:463922”][quote author=mrheated link=topic=567642.msg4129285#msg4129285 date=1350854874]
Before I talk about how terrible this server is… I’m going to unleash the DUPING & UNLIMITED PRAYER GLITCHES.

Lets start with the prayer glitch as it is what leads to the duping glitch.
Theres TWO ways this can be performed:

EASY: FRIENDS LIST BUG
Easiest of the 2 methods…

Open 2 clients… Walk the charc you want unlimited prayer on to a busy AFK area… such as hobgobs… skeletons something like that.

Open a private message with the other charc you have logged in but DONT send the message. on the charc that your NOT trying to get unlimited prayer on you want to log off.

After the charc has logged off hit enter on your main account, it will force you to log off.
When you log back in you should have unlimited prayer! & all boosted stats stay high and don’t go down.

^^^^^^^^^^^ DOES NOT WORK %100 OF THE TIME YOU MAY HAVE TO TRY IT A FEW TIMES UNTIL YOU FIGURE IT OUT.

Method 2 Is a little bit harder and take a few more tries than method 1… However:

Go to a busy afk spot with a large mob of monsters, engage in combat with one without your weapon equipped. You want to run after 3 rounds torwards another monster and X out as soon as you get there. When you log back on you should be slightly rolled back with Unlimited prayer and boosted stats.

To dupe, all you have to do is trade the items you want duped to a different account RIGHT before you try to perform the prayer glitch. as the account you traded from will have been rolled back with the items in inventory. ENJOY!

Now on to the fail running of this server…

This server is great, If you like the kind of servers that the Owners friends all have rares, and dragon 2hs. The kind of server that a mod gets a d2h when nobody else can get one… and hes allowed to go pk people in the wild with it. then this is the server for you!

IMO fail admining leads to a dead server faster. I’d recommend not wasting your time.

And if you would like a bot for this server PM me.
[/quote]

kid got pked and said give back or he was going to spam exploits… then he stared spamming them i banned him and he does this… ill be posting his ip to the public i recommend you ip ban him from your servers.[/quote]So, you’re admitting that you’re going to give out his IP address?

Read full topic
